text: We will hear arguments first this morning in Herweg against Ray.

Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, the case before you today presents this Court with familiar concepts, a federal-state cooperative program, federal regulatory issues, and specific elements of the Medicaid statute.

Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Members of the Court, in addition to responding to whatever questions you may have, I think it would be most helpful if I focus on four general areas of this case.
